review: stayed there due to heavily packed munsiyari. wanted to stay at upper side to have a great view. all other good hotels like KMVN etc were packed. this hotel have owner residing at nearby village towards milam, caretaker was a Bengali guy, made decent food item once we reached at afternoon. also dinner was lovely. but the rooms were average, room colors were distracting, small rooms.
name: TAMOJIT2014
